item.description:
Join us for a pre-comedy show dinner at nearby Vapiano Italian restaurant. Vapiano's is an upscale cafeteria style restaurant with good food, full bar and reasonable prices. We will hang out and enjoy dinner, then head across the street to Nick's for the comedy show.

If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000. Everyone pays for their own food/drink.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside entrance or at our table. Please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Pre-Comedy Dinner at Vapiano Restaurant
